name: Current Topics in Human Brain and Behaviour
description: An extensive examination of selected topics in human brain and behaviour. The neural bases of mental functions such as language, learning, memory, emotion, motivation and addiction are examples of the topics that may be included.
prerequisites: [PSYB07H3 or STAB22H3 or STAB23H3] and [PSYB55H3 or (PSYB65H3)] and [0.5 credit at the C-level in PSY courses]
